question: I am a business informatics student in the 8th semester and need a total of 90 ECTS, but so far I only have 66 ECTS. I will be retaking 5 exams and am unsure if I can pass. I urgently need an appointment for a consultation, either online or on site."
answer: Please come to one of our open office hours without making an appointment. You can also visit our office hours virtually on Friday, but you may have to wait a bit if there are a lot of students attending.
